title: Firefox users
content:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/technology/4532127.stm  
This might be of interest to any Firefox users
author: timd

comments.content: Apparently, [it’s basically unexploitable already](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111040950/http:/www.mozillazine.org/talkback.html?article=6582), because Mozilla controls the whitelist and the checks involved. Users who haven’t added sites to their download whitelist are protected from this exploit. So they say, anyway.
